passive.name: FIRED UP!
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) FIRED UP!
                                When Milio's abilities touch allied champions, their next attack deals additional magic damage equal to 10% of their Attack Damage, plus 15 magic damage (12 + 2  + 20%  ) over 1.5 seconds.Burn damage does not stack with repeated hits.

q.name: (Q) ULTRA MEGA FIRE KICK
q.description:
(Q) ULTRA MEGA FIRE KICK
 10s   50 
                                
                                
                                Kicks a fireball, knocking back the first enemy hit. The fireball then bounces past the target and explodes, dealing 80 magic damage (80/160/240/320 + 80% ) to nearby enemies and slowing them by 40 (40/45/50/55% + 5% ) for 1.5 seconds.The fireball knocks minions and monsters farther back. Explosions caused by minions and monsters also detonate in a larger area.

w.name: (W) COZY CAMPFIRE
w.description:
(W) COZY CAMPFIRE
 22/20.5/19/17.5s   90 
                                
                                
                                Ignites a buffing Soothing Fire for himself or an allied champion for 6 seconds. While Soothing Fire is burning, Milio casts Fired Up! every 3 seconds.Self-cast: Grants 9.5/13/16.5/20% attack range and restores 80 Health (80/100/120/140 + 15% )  over time to himself and nearby allied champions.Cast on allied champions: Forms a tether between himself and the target, granting 9/11/13/15% attack range and restoring 80 Health (80/100/120/140 + 15% )  over time to both champions. When Warm Hugs or Breath of Life is cast, Milio shares all ability effects with the target.Recast: Selects a new ally (inherits the remaining duration of the first cast).The tether between Milio and the allied champion has no range limit.

e.name: (E) WARM HUGS
e.description:
(E) WARM HUGS
 1s   50 
                                
                                
                                Wraps himself or an allied champion in protective flames, absorbing 60 damage (60/100/140/180 + 30% ) damage and granting 10/13/16/19%% bonus Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. The shield and bonus Movement Speed are stackable.Gains a charge every 16/15/14/13 seconds, storing up to 2 charges.

r.name: (R) BREATH OF LIFE
r.description:
(R) BREATH OF LIFE
 100/90/80s   100 
                                
                                
                                Unleashes a wave of Soothing Fire around himself, removing disables and immobilizing effects from allied champions nearby, healing them for 150 Health (150/250/350 + 50% ), and granting them 65% Tenacity for 3 seconds.Breath of Life does not remove knockback, knockup, and Airborne effects.Disables on Milio will also be removed.

example_build_detailed.passive: Overkill: Increases Ability Power by 20-45% based on level
example_build_detailed.description: This item is perfect for mages who rely on high ability power ratios and want to significantly increase their damage output. It provides a huge bonus to ability power and magic penetration. The 'Overkill' effect increases your ability power by 20-45%, depending on the level, significantly enhancing your magical abilities and attacks. This item is especially useful against enemy teams that lack magic resistance or have squishy targets, as it allows you to significantly boost your damage and deal massive magic damage.
